content: **drops sock in stockinette st with rib in snow ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no ee-345 ------------------------- **sizes** eu 32/34 -35/37 -38/40 -41/43 -44/46 us 2/4 -5/6½ -7½/9 -9½/10½ -11/13 foot length 20 - 22 - 24 - 27- 30 cm / 8 -8 3/4 -9½ -10 5/8 -11 3/4 leg length 10 - 12 - 14 - 16 - 18 cm / 4 -4 3/4 -5½ -6 1/4 -7 **materials** drops snow from garnstudio 100-150-150-150-200 g color no 22 army drops double pointed needles size 8 mm / us 11 - or size needed to get 11 sts x 15 row in stockinette st on 10 x 10 cm / 4 x 4 worked in the round on double pointed needles
